components/UtxoVsTokenFaq.DFI in UTXO form is the primary form of: DFI in UTXO form is the primary form of DFI. It is used for core cryptocurrency purposes such as send, receive and fees.
components/UtxoVsTokenFaq.What are the use cases for UTXO?: What are the use cases for UTXO?
components/UtxoVsTokenFaq.Use cases for UTXO include (but not limi: Use cases for UTXO include (but not limited) to the following:
components/UtxoVsTokenFaq.DFIs in token form are used for various: DFIs in token form are used for various DeFiChain functions such as Liquidity Pools, Loans, Auctions and DEX swaps.
components/UtxoVsTokenFaq.What are the use cases for Tokens?: What are the use cases for Tokens?
components/UtxoVsTokenFaq.Use cases for Tokens include (but not li: Use cases for Tokens include (but not limited) to the following:
components/UtxoVsTokenFaq.Swapping DFI with other tokens (e.g. dBT: Swapping DFI with other tokens (e.g. dBTC, dETH, dUSDT)
DFI exists in two forms: UTXO and Token. They can be converted with one another to serve different use cases within your light wallet.

components/LoansFaq.The decentralized loan feature allows yo: 去中心化的贷款功能可让您使用您拥有的加密货币持有量作为抵押品，并贷款去中心化的代币。当您想启动贷款功能，您必须先在链上创建一个金库，并在贷款前存入抵押品。
components/LoansFaq.How is the collateralization ratio calcu: 金库抵押率是如何计算的？
components/LoansFaq.The collateralization ratio is calculate: 抵押率的计算方法是将存入金库的抵押品总价值；除以贷款金额加上总利息，以百分比表示。
components/LoansFaq.What is the collateralization ratio used: 金库抵押率的用途是什么？
components/LoansFaq.The collateralization ratio determines t: 抵押率将决定金库的状态。比率低于最低抵押率会导致清算，此时，金库的抵押品将直接送去拍卖。
components/LoansFaq.Indicators have been included to help vi: 颜色指示显示出您的金库目前的健康状况，其中若是：
components/LoansFaq.Red: 1x – 1.25x above the minimum collat: 红色视为警告：目前处在最低抵押率的1.25倍~1.5倍
components/LoansFaq.Yellow: 1.25x – 1.5x the minimum collate: 黄色视为注意： 目前处在最低抵押率的1.25倍~1.5倍
components/LoansFaq.Green: More than 1.5x the minimum collat: 绿色视为正常：目前处在超过1.5倍的最低抵押率
components/LoansFaq.What do the different statuses of a vaul: 金库的不同状态是什么意思？
components/LoansFaq.Empty: When a vault has been created but: 清空：当一个金库已创建但尚未存入任何抵押品时。
components/LoansFaq.Ready: When collateral has been deposite: 准备就绪：当抵押品已存入金库，但尚未获得借贷时。
components/LoansFaq.Active (Red): When the collateralization: 活跃（红色）：当金库的抵押率在最低抵押率的 1 倍至 1.25 倍之间时。
components/LoansFaq.Active (Orange): When the collateralizat: 活跃（橙色）：当金库的抵押率在最低抵押率的 1.25 倍至 1.5 倍之间时。
components/LoansFaq.Active (Green): When the collateralizat: 活跃（绿色）：当金库的抵押率超过最低抵押率的 1.5 倍时。
components/LoansFaq.In liquidation: When a vault's collatera: 清算中：当金库的抵押率低于最低要求抵押率。
components/LoansFaq.Halted: When any token in the vault (col: 停止：当金库中的任何代币（抵押品或借贷）在过去一小时内波动超过 30% 时。
components/LoansFaq.How are interests calculated for loan?: 贷款的利息是如何计算的？
components/LoansFaq.There are 2 types of interests that appl: 贷款利息有两种，分别为金库利率和代币利率
components/LoansFaq.The vault interest rate is determined wh: 金库利率是在金库所有者选择金库方案时确定的，最低抵押率越高，金库利率越低。
components/LoansFaq.The token interest rate is applied on sp: 代币利率适用于特定的代币贷款，不同的代币会有不同的利率。
components/LoansFaq.The total interest rate applied on a loa: 总利率是由：由金库利率和代币利率整体以每年率计算。
components/LoansFaq.The collateral factor determines the deg: 抵押品因素决定每个抵押代币的贡献程度。例如，如果一个代币以70%的抵押因素被接受，价值100美元的代币将贡献该金库中70美元的抵押品价值。
components/LoansFaq.The vault share represents the proportio: 金库库份额代表存放在金库中的抵押代币的比例。所有金库都必须包含至少 50% 的 DFI 和/或 DUSD 作为抵押代币。当您铸造新的 dToken 时，和当您从您的金库中提取抵押品时，均会被要求达到这项要求。

components/AuctionsFaq.How do I know the status of my bid after: How do I know the status of my bid after an auction ends?
components/AuctionsFaq.For successful bidders, bid amount will: For successful bidders, bid amount will be deducted, and rewards will be automatically reflect under the Portfolio page.
components/AuctionsFaq.For unsuccessful bidders, the bidding am: For unsuccessful bidders, the bidding amount will be returned automatically to your wallet once you have been outbid by another user.
components/AuctionsFaq.Auction is an activity where users bid o: 金库拍卖是用户对已清算的金库中的抵押品收回金库未偿还贷款的活动。当金库的抵押品比率低于最低要求时，即进行清算，在此情况下，金库抵押品将分为10,000美元的批次进行拍卖。
components/AuctionsFaq.How is the minimum starting bid determin: 最低起标价是基于什么？
components/AuctionsFaq.The minimum starting bid is 105% of the: 最低标价是批次未偿贷款价值的105%。额外的5%是用来支付清算罚款的，这在金库清算时是会产生的。
components/AuctionsFaq.How is the minimum next bid determined?: 下一次出最低标价是如何计算的？
components/AuctionsFaq.The minimum next bid is 1% above the pre: 下一次的最低出价是要比上一次的出价高1%。

screens/TokensVsUtxoScreen.DFI exists in two forms - UTXO and Token: DFI有两种形式：UTXO和代币，这两种形式根据使用情况可以互换。您可以直接用轻钱包内转换两者形式。
screens/TokensVsUtxoScreen.DFI in UTXO form is the primary form of: UTXO形式的DFI是主要形式。它用于核心加密货币交易，如发送、接收和收费等。
screens/TokensVsUtxoScreen.DFIs in token form are used for various: 代币形式的DFI用于递飞链的各种DeFi功能，如流动性池、贷款、拍卖和DEX兑换。
screens/TokensVsUtxoScreen.Swapping DFI with other tokens (e.g. dBT: 兑换DFI成其他代币(如，dBTC, dETH, dUSDT, dUSDC)

DeFiChain 钱包是完全非托管的。妥善保管您的 24 个恢复字词。使用权限是您个人专属的包括钱包资金。
screens/OnboardingCarousel.View your assets in one place: 在整合情况下查看您的资产
screens/OnboardingCarousel.Review your available and locked assets: 查看您的投资组合中可用和锁定的资产
screens/OnboardingCarousel.Trade on the DEX and earn rewards from l: 在 DEX 上进行交易并使用加密货币和 dToken 从流动性挖矿中获得奖励
screens/OnboardingCarousel.Access financial opportunities with dTok: 透过去中心化金库铸造的 dToken 获得交易机会
DeFiChain 钱包是完全非托管的。个人资金只供您私人操作。

screens/CreateMnemonicWallet.If you leave this screen, you will be pr: 如果您离开此页，您会产生新的24字恢复字组. 确认要继续？
screens/CreateMnemonicWallet.Take note of the words in their correct: 请注意每个字的正确顺序排列
screens/CreateMnemonicWallet.Write down the words. Take note of the s: Write down the words. Take note of the spelling and order.
screens/CreateMnemonicWallet.A new set of recovery words will be gene: A new set of recovery words will be generated for the wallet once you leave this page.

screens/Guidelines.Before you create a wallet, you will see: 在创建钱包钱，萤幕会显示您的 24个字的恢复字组，请确保保管好这些字组.
screens/Guidelines.Learn more about recovery words: 了解更多关于「恢复字组」
screens/Guidelines.I understand it is my responsibility to: 我了解保管好我的恢复字组是我的个人责任，也了解当丢失了之后是无法还原钱包，造成可能性的资金损失.
screens/Guidelines.Take note of their correct spelling and: 请注意每个字的顺序排列和拼字
建议存在离线、不在光线下或潮湿的地方.
screens/Guidelines.Don’t share to anyone. Keep the recovery: 请不要把这恢复字组告诉别人
screens/Guidelines.I understand it is my responsibility to: I understand it is my responsibility to keep my recovery words secure. Losing them will result in the irrecoverable loss of access to my wallet funds.
screens/Guidelines.You will be shown 24 recovery words on t: You will be shown 24 recovery words on the next screen. Keep your 24-word recovery safe as it will allow you to recover access to the wallet.
screens/Guidelines.Write the words on paper. Take note of t: Write the words on paper. Take note of their correct spelling and order.
screens/Guidelines.Secure them in a safe place. Store them: Secure them in a safe place. Store them offline at a place only you have access. Keep them private and do not share it with anyone.

screens/GuidelinesRecoveryWords.Your unique 24 recovery words is a human: 您独特的24个恢复字代表可读的钱包私钥，是由BIP-39标准中的2048个字列表生成.
screens/GuidelinesRecoveryWords.You will need your recovery words to res: 您需要使用恢复字组在新的手机上恢复钱包，可以把这个关联想像成您的钱包和资金的钥匙.
screens/GuidelinesRecoveryWords.If you lose your recovery words, you wil: 如果您丢失字组，您就不能恢复钱包，也会丢失钱包所有资料和资金.
screens/GuidelinesRecoveryWords.It is important that you write down your: 请注意 ：记下恢复字组和字组排列是非常重要的.请保管好，避免他人能看到，放在一个防潮湿、防水火、或任何对字组有害的环境

screens/PinConfirmation.It may take a few seconds to securely en: 需要一些时间进行钱包加密

screens/PinConfirmation.Last attempt or your wallet will be unli: 最后一次可输入密码，为了安全，如果不通过，您的钱包会解开链接

screens/RestoreWallet.You have unsaved changes. Are you sure t: 您有未储存的更改. 您确认您要舍弃更改？
screens/RestoreWallet.The recovery words you have entered are: 您输入的恢复字组并不完全正确. 请再次确认并重试.
screens/RestoreWallet.Please provide your 24 recovery words to: 请输入您的24字恢复字组.
screens/RestoreWallet.Uppercase, numbers and special character: 不允许使用大写字母、数字和特殊字符
screens/RestoreWallet.All questions must be answered correctly: All questions must be answered correctly.
screens/RestoreWallet.Key in the 24 recovery words to regain a: Key in the 24 recovery words to regain access to your wallet.

screens/ConnectionBoundary.There seems to be a problem with the con: 网络连接不良，请查看网络设置后重试.

screens/FeatureFlagScreen.Light Wallet beta features are in the us: 轻钱包 beta 功能处于用户验收测试阶段。鼓励大家使用 beta 功能，但在使用资产时建议审慎。
screens/FeatureFlagScreen.Feature is still in Beta. Use at your ow: 功能仍处于测试阶段。使用时风险请自己负责。

screens/CompositeSwapScreen.Review and confirm transaction in the ne: 请在下个屏幕审查并确认兑换
screens/CompositeSwapScreen.By using future swap, you are buying {{t: By using future swap, you are buying {{tokenSymbol}} at 5% more than the oracle price at Settlement block
screens/CompositeSwapScreen.By using future swap, you are selling {{: By using future swap, you are selling {{tokenSymbol}} at 5% lower than the oracle price at Settlement block
screens/CompositeSwapScreen.Are you certain you want to proceed to s: 目前 Dex 稳定费费用较高，您确定要继续进行兑换将 DUSD 换成 {{tokenB}} 吗？
screens/CompositeSwapScreen.Are you certain you want to proceed with: Are you certain you want to proceed with this swap despite the DEX Stabilization fees of {{fee}} that will be incurred as part of the composite path (DUSD -> {{tokenB}})?
screens/CompositeSwapScreen.Future swap uses the oracle price of the: Future swap uses the oracle price of the selected token on the settlement block
screens/CompositeSwapScreen.You are buying dTokens at 5% more than t: You are buying dTokens at 5% more than the oracle price at settlement block.
screens/CompositeSwapScreen.You are buying {{displaySymbol}} at 5% m: You are buying {{displaySymbol}} at 5% more than the oracle price at settlement block.
screens/CompositeSwapScreen.You are selling your {{displaySymbol}} a: You are selling your {{displaySymbol}} at 5% less than the oracle price at settlement block.
screens/CompositeSwapScreen.Review full details in the next screen: Review full details in the next screen
screens/CompositeSwapScreen.By continuing, the required amount of DF: By continuing, the required amount of DFI will be converted
screens/CompositeSwapScreen.Settlement block is the pre-determined b: Settlement block is the pre-determined block height that this transaction will be executed.
screens/CompositeSwapScreen.Settlement value is based on the oracle: Settlement value is based on the oracle price at the settlement block.
screens/CompositeSwapScreen.Users will be able to cancel this transa: Users will be able to cancel this transaction as long as the settlement block has not been executed.
screens/CompositeSwapScreen.Total fees are charged based on the type:
Total fees are charged based on the type of swap, and tokens selected. It comprises of: 

1. Commission Fee
2. Transaction fee
3. DEX related fee such as stabilization fee and burn fee (if applicable)

screens/SwapTokenSelectionScreen.No results for “{{searchTerm}}” found. D: No results for “{{searchTerm}}” found. Do note that only selected tokens are available for future swap.

screens/ConfirmCompositeSwapScreen.Swap on future block {{amountA}} {{fromT: Swap on future block {{amountA}} {{fromTokenDisplaySymbol}} to {{toTokenDisplaySymbol}} on oracle price {{percentageChange}}
screens/ConfirmCompositeSwapScreen.Are you sure you want to proceed with yo: Are you sure you want to proceed with your transaction even with the high DEX stabilization fee?

screens/UnlockWallet.Please enter passcode to securely sign y: 请输入密码以安全地签下您的交易
screens/UnlockWallet.It may take a few seconds to verify: It may take a few seconds to verify
screens/UnlockWallet.Provide your passcode to view recovery w: Provide your passcode to view recovery words.
screens/UnlockWallet.Provide existing passcode to change pass: Provide existing passcode to change passcode.

screens/TransactionAuthorization.Your wallet is your responsibility, do n: 补管钱包是您的个人责任，不要忘记储存您的 24 个恢复字词。

您正要切换至 {{network}}，确认并继续？

components/RecoveryWordFaq.What happens if I lose my recovery words: 如果我丢失了恢复字组会怎样？
components/RecoveryWordFaq.Once you lose your recovery words, you w: 如果遗失恢复字组, 使用者将无法恢复钱包及所储存的资产。建议使用者必须好好保管及存放。
components/RecoveryWordFaq.Can I use the 24-words from xxx that I c: 如果我的24字组是透过 xxx 产生，可以使用吗 ？
components/RecoveryWordFaq.You can only reuse the 24-words only if:
若您的24字组是透过Jellyfish水母生态产生的， 您可以重新使用24字组。

适用的用户端包括 DeFiChain 钱包 (安卓或苹果iOS系统)，及 DFX.SWISS (安卓或苹果iOS系统)。

但是，我们非常不鼓励您重复使用它，您的24字组的安全性与生成单字的源始电脑/设备/应用程式可能有安全风险。因此，24字组的安全性是不完全确认的。加倍安全的方式是在使用每台电脑/设备/应用程式配置时都用独立一套的24字组。
components/RecoveryWordFaq.Can someone help me if I lose my recover: 如果我丢失了恢复字组可以请别人帮我吗？
components/RecoveryWordFaq.No. You have sole access to your recover: 不建议。个人的24个字组是不应该透露给任可人。除了自己，没有人有责任和义务给您保管。
components/RecoveryWordFaq.Why is it recommended to keep my recover: 为何建议用离线方式或纸张来纪录保存24个字组？
components/RecoveryWordFaq.Storing it in digital networks could mak: 储存24字组在数字网络会有较高的机会给骇客入侵及盗取。最理想的是用纸张记录和保存。
components/RecoveryWordFaq.Your unique 24 recovery words is a human: 您的连续显示24个英文字组是指储存在钱包的private key，它由2048个单字所产生的，支持BIP-39 标准的钱包。就算整个硬体钱包被盗或入侵，仍然可以确保安全的。
components/RecoveryWordFaq.Can I use the 24-word from xxx that I cr: Can I use the 24-word from xxx that I created from xxx?
components/RecoveryWordFaq.You can only reuse the 24-words if it's:
You can only reuse the 24-words if it's created from the Jellyfish ecosystem.

The compatible clients are DeFiChain Wallet (Android/iOS) and DFX.Swiss (Android/iOS).

However, it is highly discouraged that you reuse it. Your 24-words are only as secure as the source computer / device / app that generates it. If your source is comprised, so are your 24-words. Essentially, one set of 24-words per device / computer / app is encouraged.

components/DexFaq.The decentralized exchange function will: 去中心化交易所能让使用者运用点对点的方式兑换加密货币。去中心化交易所能让使用者在不透过第三方中心化交易所之下，直接兑换货币。
components/DexFaq.Each transaction will be subject to a sm: 每笔交易需要少量的交易费用。交易费用会根据网络的流量情况产生变化。
components/DexFaq.Due to the dynamic nature of the blockch:
由于区块链的动态性质，DEX上的价格随着每个区块而变。

这导致了滑价，也就是确认交易前显示出的价格和最终交易价格之间的差异。

程序中出现的「交易滑价」可自订您可接受的滑价范围。

假设交易滑点高于您选择的交易滑价百分比，那么交易不会完成，交易金额则退回到您的钱包余额。

components/LiquidityMiningFaq.Liquidity mining is a DeFi mechanism in:
流动性挖矿是DeFi机制技术，可让使用者透过提供流动资金而赚取比例化的区块奖励和交易费用回报，此比例以「流动性池股份」代表。

流动性池中的资金主要是为去中心化交易所提供资金，当池中有资金时其他使用者可随时兑换池中的两个货币。
components/LiquidityMiningFaq.How do I supply liquidity?: 如何能开始提供流动资金?
components/LiquidityMiningFaq.After deciding which pool pair you would:
当您想好您想参与的流动池配对后，请点入「新增流动资金」，并输入您想在池中增加的资金额度。

当您对配对池的某一个货币输入金额，程序会自动化平衡另一边货币所需的资金。参与流动池配对必须要在两边以同等的金额比例同时输入。
components/LiquidityMiningFaq.How do I send tokens from my DFI wallet?: 如何从我的DFI钱包发送代币？
components/LiquidityMiningFaq.Tokens on DeFiChain can only be sent to: 递飞链上的代币只能发送至DFI地址。这表示您不能直接发送至没有引入递飞链技术的交易所或第三方平台。同样地，递飞链流动性池代币只能发送到另一个DFI钱包地址。
components/LiquidityMiningFaq.What are some exchanges and platforms I: 目前有哪些平台可支持递飞链和生态代币？
components/LiquidityMiningFaq.1. Kucoin\n2. Bittrex\n3. Transak\n4. Ca:
1. Kucoin
2. Bittrex
3. 其他有DFI上线交易所
4. Cake DeFi

请参考更多关于 zhs.DeFiChain.com
components/LiquidityMiningFaq.Can I send liquidity pool tokens to an e: 是否可以把流动性池中的代币直接发送到其他交易所或其他地址？
components/LiquidityMiningFaq.Liquidity tokens can only be sent to ano: 由于流动性池的代币是属于流动性池的代币系统，您只能发送池中的DFI到其他交易所。若您想要发送其他代币，请先使用流动池兑换成DFI，在发出至其他交易所使用。
components/LiquidityMiningFaq.How do I receive tokens on my DFI wallet: 如何在我的DFI钱包中接收代币？
components/LiquidityMiningFaq.You can receive DFI tokens into your wal:
您可以前往接收页面找到您钱包的地址，只要使用这个地址（可转发分享或扫一扫QR码来接收DFI代币。

请注意因为递飞链生态中的功能，所以此钱包只能接收递飞链的DFI或生态中的代币，而无法接收其他区块链的代币（如 BTC、ETH）。
components/LiquidityMiningFaq.Liquidity mining is a DeFi mechanism in: Liquidity mining is a DeFi mechanism in which participants supply cryptocurrencies into liquidity pools, and in turn, be rewarded with fees and token based on their share of the total pool liquidity.

components/PasscodeFaq.Your six-digit numeric passcode, set by: 您的六位数字密码是由您设置，这密码将用于授权所有交易。请保管好和负责您的密码私密性和安全性。
components/PasscodeFaq.What happens if I forgot my passcode? Ca: 如果我忘记了我的密码会怎么样？有人能帮我找回我的密码吗？
components/PasscodeFaq.Your passcode is your responsibility, he: 除了您本人知道密码之外，没有任何人会知道。因此，没有人能帮您找回您的私人密码。
components/PasscodeFaq.Can I change my passcode?: 我可以更改我的密码吗？
components/PasscodeFaq.Yes, you can change your passcode from y: 可以的，你能在程序的设置中更改您的密码。建议您定期更改密码，以确保最高的安全性。
components/PasscodeFaq.Is passcode the same as phone PIN code?: App密码和手机PIN码是一样的吗？
components/PasscodeFaq.Your passcode is valid only for DeFiChai: 您的App密码只对递飞链DeFiChain轻钱包有效。
components/PasscodeFaq.What happens if I forgot my passcode? Ca: What happens if I forgot my passcode? Can someone help me retrieve my passcode?
components/PasscodeFaq.Your passcode is your responsibility. No: Your passcode is your responsibility. No one, aside from you, knows it. It is important that you keep your passcode safe and change it from time to time.
components/PasscodeFaq.Yes! You can change your passcode from y: Yes! You can change your passcode from your setting in-app. We recommend changing your passcode regularly for maximum security.
components/PasscodeFaq.Your passcode is valid only for DeFiChai: Your passcode is valid only for DeFiChain Light Wallet.
components/PasscodeFaq.Use cases for UTXO include (but not limi: Use cases for UTXO include (but not limited) to the following:

components/ReservedDFIInfoText.A small UTXO amount (0.1 DFI) is reserve: 需要预留一些可使用的 UTXO(0.1 DFI)作为费用

components/ConversionInfoText.Conversion will be required. Your passco: 将需要转换。您需要以App密码授权转换和兑换交易
components/ConversionInfoText.Please wait as we convert tokens for you: 正在为您的交易转换代币，请稍候。转换过程是不可逆转的。
components/ConversionInfoText.Send Liquidity Pool tokens only to DeFiC: 请注意，您只能将流动池的d代币发送至已引入递飞链技术栈的钱包。若您发到不确认可接受d代币的钱包或其他交易所，有可能造成无无法逆转的资金损失.

components/ConversionBreakdown.Amount above are prior to transaction: 以上金额为交易前的金额

screens/LoansScreen.Choose Loan Token to Borrow: 选择要借用的贷款代币
screens/LoansScreen.You need a vault with collaterals to bor: You need a vault with collaterals to borrow tokens
screens/LoansScreen.With vaults, you gain access to a rich e: With vaults, you gain access to a rich economy of decentralized tokens.
screens/LoansScreen.With a selected loan scheme, you control: With a selected loan scheme, you control how much is required for your vault.
screens/LoansScreen.Keep your vaults healthy and green, by m: Keep your vaults healthy and green, by monitoring its collateralization.
screens/LoansScreen.With oracles, your vaults and loans alig: With oracles, your vaults and loans align with market prices outside the blockchain.
screens/LoansScreen.Loan tokens get their prices from oracle: Loan tokens get their prices from oracles.

screens/CreateVaultScreen.Choose loan scheme for your vault: 为您的金库选择贷款方案
screens/CreateVaultScreen.This sets the minimum collateralization: 这将设置了最低抵押率和金库的利率.
screens/CreateVaultScreen.Keep note of your selected collateraliza: 请注意您为金库选择的抵押品比率，以维持持续贷款.

screens/CreateVaultScreen.Loan scheme of your vault determines the: 您的金库的贷款计划将决定您所需的贷款抵押品
Select a loan scheme for your vault.
screens/CreateVaultScreen.By continuing, the required amount of DF: By continuing, the required amount of DFI will be converted
screens/CreateVaultScreen.Monitor your vault’s collateralization t: Monitor your vault’s collateralization to prevent liquidation.
screens/CreateVaultScreen.Vault fee will be used to create a new v: Vault fee will be used to create a new vault. After the vault is successfully closed, half of the fee deposited will be returned to your wallet, with the remaining half burned.

screens/ConfirmCreateVaultScreen.ID will generate once vault has been cre: 金库创建后会产生金库ID
screens/ConfirmCreateVaultScreen.Creating vault with min. collateralizati: 创建金库时，设置的最低抵押率为{{amount}}%，利率为{{ir}}%年回报率

components/BottomSheetInfo.Each transaction will be subject to a sm: 每笔交易需要支付少量的费用. 金额可能因网络拥挤程度而异.
components/BottomSheetInfo.This fee serves as initial deposit for y: 这笔费用作为您金库的初始押金。当您选择关闭这个金库时，您会收回 1 DFI。
components/BottomSheetInfo.The collateralization ratio represents t: 抵押率指的是存放在金库中的抵押品数量与贷款金额的关系比例，而是由百分比表示。
components/BottomSheetInfo.Next collateralization ratio represents: 下一个抵押率代表金库的抵押率，以下一个小时的抵押品/贷款代币的价格算出。
components/BottomSheetInfo.Annual vault interest rate based on the: 基于所选贷款计划的金库年利率。
components/BottomSheetInfo.Minimum required collateralization ratio: 基于所选贷款计划的最低要求抵押率。当抵押率低于最低要求时，金库将被清算。
components/BottomSheetInfo.Next collateralization: 当新价格生效，下一个抵押比率
components/BottomSheetInfo.This amount is the total interest amount: 此金额是金库和代币利率的利息总和
components/BottomSheetInfo.The minimum bid a user must place in ord: 用户参与拍卖必须提交的最低标价。
components/BottomSheetInfo.Slippages are rate charges that occur wi: 交易滑价是每项交易中的兑换率变化。选择您愿意接受这滑价的多少百分比（如下显示)。
components/BottomSheetInfo.Oracles provide real time price data poi: Oracles provide real time price data points from trusted sources, to reflect onto DeFiChain.

您的金库已被锁定以进行清算.
screens/VaultDetailScreen.Your vault is at risk of liquidation. Pr: 您的金库状态可能会被清算。为了确保金库能持续运作，请增加抵押品资金或立即还完贷款。
使用此金库需要抵押品.

screens/EditCollateralScreen.Each token has their own collateral fact: 每个代币都有不同的抵押品价值因素.
screens/EditCollateralScreen.Vault needs DFI to be in 50% vault share: DFI抵押资金需要占金库的50%

screens/EditCollateralScreen.Are you sure you want to remove collater: 您确定您要移除抵押品代币吗?

components/AddOrRemoveCollateralForm.The collateral factor determines the deg: 抵押因素决定了每款抵押代币的贡献程度比例。

screens/PaybackLoanScreen.Insufficient {{token}} to pay for the en: {{token}} 余额不足以支付输入的金额
screens/PaybackLoanScreen.A 5% fee is applied when you pay with {{: 当您使用 {{tokenSymbol}} 付款时，将收取 5% 的费用。
screens/PaybackLoanScreen.How do you want to pay?: How do you want to pay?

screens/ConfirmPaybackLoanScreen.Paying {{amountToPayInPaymentToken}} {{p: 正在付款 {{amountToPayInPaymentToken}} {{paymentSymbol}} 作为支付贷款。
正在付款 {{amountToPayInPaymentToken}} {{paymentSymbol}} ({{amountToPayInLoanToken}} {{symbol}}) 作为支付贷款。

screens/BorrowLoanTokenScreen.Review and confirm transaction in the ne: 在下个屏幕中检查并确认交易
screens/BorrowLoanTokenScreen.Insufficient vault collateral to borrow: 抵押金库不足够支付借贷金额
screens/BorrowLoanTokenScreen.This amount may place the vault in liqui: 这金额可能会导致金库清算
screens/BorrowLoanTokenScreen.Your vault needs at least 50% of DFI and: 您的金库必须包含至少 50% 的 DFI 和/或 DUSD 作为抵押代币
screens/BorrowLoanTokenScreen.This vault needs at least 50% of DFI and: 这金库必须包含至少 50% 的 DFI 和/或 DUSD 以用作铸造去中心化资产代币

screens/EditLoanSchemeScreen.Make sure your collateralization ratio i: 确保您的抵押率仍然高于最低要求的抵押率
screens/EditLoanSchemeScreen.Confirm your vault details in next scree: 在下一页确认金库的细行
screens/EditLoanSchemeScreen.Review full details in the next screen: Review full details in the next screen
screens/EditLoanSchemeScreen.You can only select a scheme lower than: You can only select a scheme lower than your vault's current collateralization.

screens/ConfirmEditLoanSchemeScreen.You are editing scheme of vault: 更改金库中的比率计划
screens/ConfirmEditLoanSchemeScreen.Prev. vault interest (APR): 前次最低利率 (年回报率)

components/EmptyCollateral.Add DFI and tokens as collateral to get: 加入 DFI及其他代币作抵押即可以开始借贷

screens/CloseVaultScreen.Upon closing, this Vault ID will not be: 关闭后，此金库编号将不再可使用。在关闭之前，请确保您不需要此金库中的任何资料.

screens/ConfirmPlaceBidScreen.Amount will be deducted from your curren: Amount will be deducted from your current wallet

screens/ServiceProviderScreen.Adding malicious service providers may r: 添加恶意服务供应商 可能会导致可收回资金。风险自负
screens/ServiceProviderScreen.Only add URLs that are fully trusted and: Only add URLs that are fully trusted and secured. Adding malicious service providers may result in irrecoverable funds. Changes do not take effect until you manually restart the app.
screens/ServiceProviderScreen.Adding custom service provider: 添加自定义服务提供者
screens/ServiceProviderScreen.In doing so, you will be reverted back t: 这样做，您将恢复到手机轻钱包的预设终端点。你想继续吗？
screens/ServiceProviderScreen.Reset default service provider: 重置预设 服务供应商
screens/ServiceProviderScreen.This will reset the service provider\nto: 这会将服务提供商重置为默认网络连结。
